item.description:
June 14th Flatwater Training by RI Canoe/Kayak Assoc.

Would you like to improve your flatwater paddling skills? The RICKA Flatwater Group will be holding a Basic Flatwater Paddling Course on Sunday, June 14th at 1:00. In this 3-hour class, paddlers will learn the basic strokes and maneuvers to control their boats on flatwater. We will also cover basic rescue techniques.

Click on the link Flatwater Training to register or to learn more. You need not be a RICKA member, but free if you are.

Flatwater Training : http://www.woonsocket...
item.how_to_find_us: I am not attending - look for Cheryl Thompson, RICKA Flatwater Chair
item.name: RICKA Paddle Training
